com.rockaport.alice

Class Alice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockaport.alice.Alice

  • public class Alice
extends java.lang.Object
    The main Alice API for encryption and decryption of byte arrays and files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Alice(AliceContext context)
      Initializes a new Alice object for encryption and decryption.

        Parameters:
        algorithm - the key will be used with
        keyLength - length of key
        Returns:
        a byte array
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if either initialization or generation fails

        password - the password

        input - the input file
        output - the output file
        password - the password
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if initialization or encryption fails

        Parameters:
        input - the byte array input
        password - the password
        Returns:
        a decrypted byte array
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - if initialization, decryption, or the MAC comparison fails
